original_text: If the officials hear that I have spoken with you and come to you and say to you, ‘Tell us what you said to the king and what the king said to you; hide nothing from us and we will not put you to death,’
korean_text: 만일 고관들이 내가 너와 말하였다 함을 듣고 와서 네게 말하기를 네가 왕에게 말씀한 것을 우리에게 전하라 우리에게 숨기지 말라 그리하면 우리가 너를 죽이지 아니하리라 또 왕이 네게 말씀한 것을 전하라 하거든

sentences.original_text: If the officials hear that I have spoken with you
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 관원들이 내가 너와 말했다는 것을 듣고

sentences.original_text: ‘Tell us what you said to the king
and what the king said to you;
and we will not put you to death,’
